section.43: Loans, Payment of Loans, Freezing of Property, Bankruptcy

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:A man came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said, "I am often betrayed in bargaining." The Prophet (ﷺ) advised him, "When you buy something, say (to the seller), 'No deception." The man used to say so afterwards
